name: Hero101
description:
Hero101 is a roguelike played in an infinite labyrinth. Explore the labyrinth search, earn and buy items to improve your character to become the strongest!

Some of the assets are made by ourselves but the others were taken from Mixamo and the Megascan library. 

The game was made by our team of 4 people for the my-first-game-jam-summer-2021:

Pierre ELLOY - (pielloy) - Lead Dev
Kyle Jennings - (Keelai) - Lead Modeling
Marc Soliman (MWAC) - Dev
smagby - Concept art


Artist credit for assets downloaded for use

-Skeleton: https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-models/character/fantasy/skull-18fbb65b-38cd-44...

-Main Character base mesh: https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-models/character/man/man-base-33350cc0-9745-4f8...
